metadata.title: CVE-2020-24512 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Observable timing discrepancy in some Intel(R) Processors may allow anauthenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via localaccess.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24512` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20210608.0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20210608.0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1').
